DOC.detailed_description: Atherosclerosis primary cause cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease , top two cause death industrialized country include China . Lutein find protective atherosclerosis case control study . However , intervention atherosclerosis report . In present study , 192 subject randomly assign four group treat different amount lutein . The investigator observe change serum lutein concentration hyper-pressure liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) , compare difference common carotid IMT arterial stiffness carotid ultrasonography intervention . Serum biochemistry index include cholesterol ( CHO ) , triglyceride ( TG ) , high density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( HDL-C ) , low density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( LDL-C ) glucose ( Glu ) measure 0 , 7 12 month treatment auto-analyzer .
DOC.criteria: early atherosclerosis ; age 45 68 year ; Han nationality history myocardial infarction , stroke , revascularization , coronary bypass operation , local carotid IMT > 1300μm supplemental vitamin and/or mineral use ≥ 4 week start study
